SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into site_view_histories (ip, user_id, site_id, site_title, site_url, times, loc, created_at, last_view_time, browser_ua) values (#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{times,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{loc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastViewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{browserUa,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.update: update site_view_histories set ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, site_title = #{siteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_url = #{siteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, times = #{times,jdbcType=TINYINT}, loc = #{loc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_view_time = #{lastViewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, browser_ua = #{browserUa,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where hid = #{hid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select hid, ip, user_id, site_id, site_title, site_url, times, loc, created_at, last_view_time, browser_ua from site_view_histories where hid = #{hid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
